overall_summary: The reasoning demonstrates a systematic approach focused on daily seasonality and simple averaging methods. The analysis emphasizes stability through hourly averaging across available days while acknowledging limitations of short data horizons and potential weekly patterns. Method selection shows practical prioritization of robustness over complexity given the 4-day dataset.
common_data_patterns: Potential weekly patterns (acknowledged but not utilized)
Complete training data with missing value awareness
key_insights: Hourly averaging preferred over last-day replication for stability
Explicit matrix-based approach for hourly pattern extraction
Date/time handling considerations for forecast alignment
Explicit rejection of trend analysis due to short data window
Three-decimal precision maintenance in output formatting
complexity_analysis: Moderately complex with structured data handling and multi-step validation. Combines basic statistical methods with detailed implementation planning for datetime management and output formatting, while maintaining computational simplicity at its core.
